description: US President Joe Biden says he fears Vladimir Putin does not have a way out of the Ukraine war.
title: Biden fears Putin has no exit strategy from Ukraine - as Macron warns Kyiv over EU membership bid

description: The chance of the global average temperature exceeding 1.5C above pre-industrial levels in one of the next five years is now about 50:50 (48%), according to a new Met Office study.
title: 'Worrying' 50-50 chance global temperature will breach crucial target in next five years

description: The official number of people killed in a powerful explosion at an iconic hotel in Cuba's capital city Havana has risen to 40.
title: Number of people killed in Havana hotel explosion rises to 40 as more bodies pulled from ruins

description: Australian police are investigating after 50kg of suspected cocaine was discovered near the body of a diver on a riverbank in New South Wales.
title: 50kg of cocaine found near diver's body on riverbank

description: Vladimir Putin's address during Russia's Victory Day commemorations was the focus of widespread speculation in advance - and arguably the most intensely scrutinised since he ordered the invasion of Ukraine.
title: Body language expert gives assessment of Putin's behaviour

description: As the sound of war bangs in the distance, Oleksiy Savkevych and his volunteers take essential supplies wherever they are needed.
title: The aid team that won't stop delivering supplies near the frontline as Putin's bombs rain down

description: The son of late Philippine dictator Ferdinand Marcos has triumphed in the country's presidential election.
title: Dictator's son wins back power in Philippines after family was forced into exile

description: Schools, gyms, hairdressers, parks, restaurants and bars are shut, millions have been told to work from home, but do not call it a lockdown.
title: Beijing closes down businesses as millions told to work from home - but government says it is not a lockdown

description: Russia's ambassador to Poland had red paint thrown in his face by protesters opposed to the war in Ukraine.
title: Russian ambassador has red paint thrown in face at WWII memorial

description: An MP in Sri Lanka's ruling party has died after a stand-off with anti-government protesters and the homes of a number of other politicians have been set on fire as violence escalated in the country.
title: MP dies in stand-off with angry protesters as homes of Sri Lankan politicians set on fire in escalating violence
